description: Model allocation policy for the swarm. Assigns model tiers to task groups.

user_preferences.comment: User's preferred model for 'primary' tier work. Can be sonnet or opus.

tier_descriptions.primary: Dynamically resolves to user's chosen model (sonnet or opus). For core reasoning work.
tier_descriptions.economy: Haiku tier. Fast, cheap operations: shaping, verification, reporting, infra.
tier_descriptions.standard: Sonnet tier. Solid reasoning: specs, analytics, general work.
tier_descriptions.elite: Opus tier. Reserved for wisdom, learning, and self-patching.

upgrade_notes.edge_to_economy: When Haiku 5.0 matches Sonnet 4.5 reasoning, move 'critic' group to economy tier.
upgrade_notes.policy_override: To pin a specific version for determinism, set env: ANTHROPIC_DEFAULT_SONNET_MODEL=claude-3-5-sonnet-20241022
